Plot: A woman spirals out of control while trying to keep her son from being found culpable in a murder investigation.
Title: The Deep End
Writer: Elisabeth Sanxay Holding (novel), Scott McGehee, David Siegel
Actors: Tilda Swinton, Goran Visnjic, Jonathan Tucker, Peter Donat
tomatoConsensus: A well-acted film noir with arresting visuals.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 18 nominations.
